descriptionHtml:
---------------
[b]Description[/b]
---------------
This Mod combines PerMa's perk description with the useful information required to make an informed decision when choosing your perks. Immerse yourself in PerMa's fluffy perk descriptions while building your characters exactly the way you want them. Various grammer and spelling errors have been corrected and many non-fluff descriptions from PerMa's documentation have been rewritten to better convey information. No more will you be required to solve mathematical equations while sorting through your options, for I have done this for you.

Also, each description has been rewritten in first-person to give perks more of a personal touch and to complement the TTYM - Think to Yourself Messages mod, that many use.

---------------
[b]Optional[/b]
---------------
I have neatly organized my alterations into text documents and included them as an optional download, in case one might like to read through them before installing the mod or whatever.

---------------
[b]Installation[/b]
---------------
This mod requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]T3nd0's Perkus Maximus[/url].
Install with your favorite mod manager, or drop the .esp files into your data folder and overwrite.

---------------
[b]Credits[/b]
---------------
T3nd0's Perkus Maximus
